title: Launch new apps window via keybindings

rules.description: left control + left shift + ` (backtick) - launches a new iTerm2 window with the default profile

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "iTerm"' -e 'create window with default profile' -e activate -e end

rules.description: left control + left shift + 1 - launches a new Safari window

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Safari"' -e 'make new document' -e activate -e end

rules.description: left control + left shift + 2 - launches a new Google Chrome window

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Google Chrome"' -e 'make new window' -e activate -e end
